body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling Harmony Music School. My name is Edward James. May I ask who I'm speaking with today?

Hi, this is Teresa Williams. I'm a bit surprised by this call. What's this about?

Thank you for confirming your name, Teresa. I'm reaching out to ensure all of our records stay up-to-date for our students' privacy and security. Can I have your student ID number for verification? It's eight digits long.

Um, alright... it's zero one two three four five six seven.

Great, thank you. Could you also provide me with the email address associated with your account?

Sure, it's teresa.williams123@email.com.

Perfect, Teresa. All we want to do is make sure that your personal information is handled with the utmost care. We take your privacy seriously.

I see. Thank you for explaining.

You're welcome. If you have any concerns or more questions about your privacy, please feel free to reach out.

Thank you for your time today, Teresa. Have a great day!
